column5: Too nice to be indoors, so off to another fave pond. Big white flakes of snow blowing around while I wait for a bite.  Not a stellar day, but fish were caught. 20 over the course of 7 hours, a lot of dinks, and a few smelt as well ( they make great doggie snacks). Kept enough decent perch for a dinner for two.
Better than a poke in the eye with a sharp stick eh!!!  The little buggers gotta eat sometime!  Glad to see you got out, the wind is blowin' a million miles an hour here!!!

I always set aside a couple of fillets for the puppies. Wouldn't do for them to be left out   Besides, they're the only ones who put up with me unconditionally  Glad I got out today. Next 2 days will be Brrrrrr!
Nice job Bruce, glad to see the bite starting to pick up.  Let's hope this cold front moving in doesn't shut it down again
That's what me dear old mudder still says.  Good onya Bruce for braving the elephants today.

i think a poke in the eye would have been better for me today GCD!!!     blowin cold and nasty on the hardstuff today and not a bit!     those are a deccent lookin sink of perch, cant help but notice the one in the dead center appears to have a blue tail!  please, just please dont put up a pic of them all cooked up at midnight tonight!  my guts were mad at you last night HAHAHAHAH  Matt!
well done Bruce  They sure are tasty little guys,just packed up my share from sunday's outting.
Great report and pic Bruce  Look likes another successful and fun outing..... congratulations You'll have enough for supper and breakfast tomorrow.  Thanks for sharing Jacques

good to see you starting the month off right there Bruce, gotta have fishing pics from all 12 months  I been meaning to get out there with you guys to share some hardwater action but I can't seem to get off the river trout fishing...I toss the coin...hmmmm do I try and get out and catch a couple perch...or do I try and get out and catch a 10 lber steelie..seems with me the big fishing fun always prevails over the "food fishin"  I'll have to make a point of getting out with you guys at least once before it gets too warm, you still have to get out with me on the river for some trout action!!!
Geez, I always seem to miss the good days when we get out icing, total Friday, me 1 perch, Bruce 2.   Gotta start finding these good days or just wait till Spring and open water.
One day can be great. The other    That's fishing.
